_sText:
This is my adaptation of the Doom1 level 1 map for CSS Gungame.

If you are nostalgic for the old days, this map can help bring back some of
those fond memories when the FPS was new.

I have had to make some modifications and additions to make it a playable
gungame map.  It uses standard CSS textures and meshes.
There is a new section which is blocked off by several blue
doors.  Someone must retrieve the "Blue Key" (outside) in order to open
the Blue Doors and gain access to this section.

Also note that the drums will explode and cause damage when shot.  There
are drums that explode, poison the water, spew fire, and release toxic
gases.

And the health cubes really work, but note that they are removed even if a 
player with full health touches them.
